name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R-ROGUE
description:
You have to face all the horror of the zone.
 The goal of the game is to last as long as possible.
 Several types of weapons and enemies are all you need to pass a couple of evenings!
 How to play:
  walk - WASD
  shoot - LKM
  change weapons -Q
Chests to break with a knife.
Good Luck, stalker.
